definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (meaning dub.; perh., if Kt right, my husband's father is the dew, cf. [[אֲבִיטַל]])—LXX Ameitai, Mitat; A Amital, Amitaq, LXXL Amital;—mother of the kings Jehoahaz and Zedekiah, sons of Josiah 2Ki 23:31, 2Ki 24:18 Qr (Kt [[חמיטל]]) = Je 52:l Qr (Kt id.)
